Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: This is definitely a YES and a MUST if you are in Amsterdam. The owner was just amazing, so courteous and kind plus a cutie! Amazing food that tasted like homemade and exquisite service!! I ordered pumpkin soup and a veggie sandwich...best ‚Ä¶

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: Lovely staff and good, homemade sandwiches and burgers. Splendid place to have a quick bite in the terrace, in a sunny day.

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: My personal favourite cafe in Amsterdam centre. The place is tiny inside with outdoors seating, but super cosy with interesting decor to look at. The staff there are absolute legends. Every time i‚Äôve been there they were nice and always ‚Ä¶

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text:
This place is great. It's so cute, welcoming and homely.

We went here a few times for coffee as it was right next to our hotel. ‚Ä¶

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: Really incredible experience. We're a family of 6 with 4 guys above 6'2" they managed to squeeze us in in a real cosy and comfy way. The food is simple but great, a real feel at home place. 5/5 would recommend.

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: My favorite coffeespot in town!

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: Awesome little gingerbread house among all the tall buildings. The last of the old police stations in Amsterdam, now an historic monument! Great food, the veggie burger was awesome, and they made it in a lettuce wrap for me. The veggie wrap was excellent as well. So quaint and unique!

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: Nice Buddhist flags outside are contrary to the combative mean customer service and bad food. ‚Ä¶

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: Had one of the best burgers of my life! The music was great and the Girls had a lot of fun while cooking, which created a great atmosphere. Definitely will visit again (22.02)

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: Great place, super cozy and delicious food. The staff was amazingly friendly and the prices are also very good especially if you consider it's in the middle of Amsterdam, I would definitely come back here again. My friends and I all had a different burger and we were all happy with our choice. Thanks guys

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: Stopped in for hot drinks to warm up, and had amazing chai lattes and golden turmeric lattes, all made with non-dairy milk. The staff was friendly, the atmosphere was charming and relaxed. Great place to stop in!

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: A fun, quaint place staffed by upbeat hip kids. The downside that the "fresh organic" food was none of the sort, the overpriced vege burger was the kind of thing one may expect from an all night kebab shop - just at double the price. The flat white seemed the lack any trace of actual coffee. However, a fun place to hang out.

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: The tables were dirty, but the apple pie was very good

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: One of the best reading spots in Amsterdam. Great food. Friendly staff.

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: Very good selection of food and friendly service.

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: Fantastic burgers! absoluty recommend this place! Great staff and low prices!

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: Don't know what it is about this place but I've had some magical conversations here. The staff is amazing. The food divine. Stay away, this is MY spot :p

Review Text: Super tasty burgers and herbal tea. Cousines turned up to 11.

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: Eclectic and cozy atmosphere, excellent eco-conscious food variety, friendly service. A delightfully unique place to stumble upon in the wonderful city of Amsterdam. Don't miss it!

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text:

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: Super cute and very unique cafe! If you are in the area you definetly have to go! It's a super small house in the middle of the road turned into a cafe! Loved it!

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: Tasty and atmospheric. What a gem. Small, intimate place you could say, right in the hustle and bustle of the  central Amsterdam. We ordered burgers which were excellent as was the service

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: Nice cozy place. Amazing burgers and wraps with vegetarian options, all bio. Real hidden gem close to city centre. Reasonable prices and very good quality

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: Excellent food, bio and healthy at a reasonable price. Good vibes all the way, cosy place and extremely friendly staff. Very little place but really good atmosphere

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: I went here for lunch and really appreciated the service! I wasn‚Äôt a fan of the sandwich I ordered, but right away they replaced it with a delicious grilled vegetable sandwich and that hit the spot!

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: Cute little hippie hut that resists the epidemic of cold and uncomfortable hipster cafes, it has a warm bohemian vibe and great sandwiches, so definitely visit if you want to avoid the more touristy spots in the center

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: Excellent food & extremely friendly service and staff, I really enjoyed the place and the food , I have ordered panini cheese , which was very delicious.

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: Food was good, but a bit expensive and the portion small for the price. The place is nice, has outdoor seating.

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: Lovely location to hide from the rain. Very friendly staff. Very good food. Worth a stop to escape the big crowds.

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: The palace for the people - an oasis full of great coffee and homemade apple pie, fresh sandwiches, a cosy terrace, and all around super friendly atmosphere.

Name: Stadspaleis
Review Text: Cosy, very cosy and tiny. Good organic food fresh made. Unfortunately only English speaking personel. This is Amsterdam!

Name: Stadspaleis
